div.p: Test cases are set of steps or user actions that are automated to play out a test case scenario. For more information, refer to
You can view the test cases under current application by navigating to Test development>Test cases from the testsigma dashboard.

figure.p: To learn how to create test case, refer to

div.p: From the Test Cases page, you can:

ul.li: Search for a test case by name.
Sort test cases based on various criteria.
Filter test cases to narrow and customize your search for test cases from the test causes list.
Import test cases from an exported list.
Bulk delete one or more test cases.

div.p: Testsigma provides a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for efficiently creating, organising, executing test cases. It enables teams to collaborate efficiently, ensures maximum test coverage, and provides valuable insights into the testing workflow. Users can create test cases using either the Test Sigma Recorder or by manually writing steps using NLP. This document gives users step by step on how to manage test case in Test sigma to optimise the testing process.

ol.li: Navigate to Create Tests>Test Cases in the left side navbar. Click the Create Test Case button in the top right corner of the Test Case List page to create a test case.
Replace Untitled in the top left corner of the screen on the Test Case Details page with a Title for the title case.

You can create the test steps for your test case using either of the following methods:
Write Test Steps Manually using NLPs by clicking Add new step
Use Testsigma Recorder to Record steps.

section.p: Ensure you create a Project before creating or editing test cases in testsigma.

li.span: Navigate to Create Tests>Test Cases in the left side navbar. Click the Create Test Case button in the top right corner of the Test Case List page to create a test case.
Replace Untitled in the top left corner of the screen on the Test Case Details page with a Title for the title case.
You can create the test steps for your test case using either of the following methods:
Write Test Steps Manually using NLPs by clicking Add new step
Use Testsigma Recorder to Record steps.

div.div: Note: You should install the Testsigma test step recorder extention

section.p: Use the right-side navbar on the Test Case Details page to access Advanced Options for better management and grouping of test cases while creating Test Suites and Test Plans and to improve understanding of test coverage.

li.span: Click Test Case Info in the right-side navbar. You can update Test Case Name and view description from there and view information about the Test Casse's creation and last update.
Click Ad-Hoc Runs in the right-side navbar. This will enable you to view the history and details of Ad-Hoc runs results for the Test Case.
Click Test Case Settings in the right-side navbar, and configure the following options:
